00016 EndpointModel::EndpointModel(void* dataPointer, QObject *parent): 
00017 QAbstractTableModel(parent), modelParameters_(), table_()
00018 {
00019     Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "EndpointModel constructor",
00020         "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00021 
00022     // Set the pointer to the actual data structure containing the endpoints.
00023     modelParameters_ = static_cast<
00024         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > *>(dataPointer);
00025 
00026     restore();
00027 }

00030 }

00032 int EndpointModel::rowCount( const QModelIndex & parent /*= QModelIndex() */ ) const {
00033 
00034     // not hierarchical model
00035     if (parent.isValid())
00036         return 0;
00037 
00038     return table_.size();
00039 }

00041 int EndpointModel::columnCount( const QModelIndex & parent /*= QModelIndex() */ ) const {
00042 
00043     // not hierarchical model
00044     if (parent.isValid())
00045         return 0;
00046 
00047     return 3;
00048 }

00050 QVariant EndpointModel::data(const QModelIndex & index, 
00051                              int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */) const
00052 {
00053     if (!index.isValid())
00054         return QVariant();
00055 
00056     // if row is invalid
00057     if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00058         return QVariant();
00059 
00060     if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00061 
00062         switch (index.column()) {
00063             case 0: 
00064                 return table_.value(index.row())->getName();
00065             case 1:
00066                 return table_.value(index.row())->getDataType();
00067             case 2:
00068                 return table_.value(index.row())->getValue();
00069             default:
00070                 return QVariant();
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     // if unsupported role
00075     else {
00076         return QVariant();
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 QVariant EndpointModel::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00081                                    int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const
00082 {
00083     // only horizontal headers are supported
00084     if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal) 
00085         return QVariant();
00086 
00087     if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00088 
00089         switch (section) {
00090             case 0:
00091                 return tr("Name");
00092             case 1:
00093                 return tr("Data type");
00094             case 2:
00095                 return tr("Direction");
00096             default:
00097                 return QVariant();
00098         }
00099     }
00100 
00101     // if unsupported role
00102     else {
00103         return QVariant();
00104     }
00105 }

00107 bool EndpointModel::setData(const QModelIndex& index, const QVariant& value, 
00108                             int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ )
00109 {
00110     if (!index.isValid())
00111         return false;
00112 
00113     if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00114 
00115         switch (index.column()) {
00116             case 0: {
00117 
00118                 // if name changes then the map has to change the indexing also
00119                 QString oldKey = table_.value(index.row())->getName();
00120 
00121                 // remove the item with old key and insert the value with new key
00122                 //QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modParam = modelParameters_->take(oldKey);
00123                 //modelParameters_->insert(value.toString(), modParam);
00124 
00125                 table_.value(index.row())->setName(value.toString());
00126                 break;                          
00127                     }
00128             case 1: {
00129                 table_.value(index.row())->setDataType(value.toString());
00130                 break;
00131                     }
00132             case 2: {
00133                 table_.value(index.row())->setValue(value.toString());
00134                 break;
00135                     }
00136             default:
00137                 return false;
00138 
00139         }
00140         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00141         return true;
00142     }
00143     // if role is not supported
00144     else {
00145         return false;
00146     }
00147 }

00149 Qt::ItemFlags EndpointModel::flags(const QModelIndex& index) const {
00150 
00151     if (!index.isValid())
00152         return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00153 
00154     return Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEditable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled;
00155 }

00157 void EndpointModel::onRemoveRow( int row ) {
00158 
00159     // if row is invalid
00160     if (row < 0 || row >= table_.size())
00161         return;
00162 
00163     beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00164 
00165     // remove the object from the map
00166     table_.removeAt(row);
00167 
00168     endRemoveRows();
00169 
00170     // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00171     emit contentChanged();
00172 }
00173 
00174 void EndpointModel::onAddRow() {
00175 
00176     beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00177 
00178     table_.append(QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(new ModelParameter()));
00179 
00180     endInsertRows();
00181 
00182     // tell also parent widget that contents have been changed
00183     emit contentChanged();
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool EndpointModel::isValid() const {
00187 
00188     for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00189 
00190         // if one model parameter is not valid
00191         if (!table_.value(i)->isValid()) {
00192 
00193             emit errorMessage(tr("Endpoint %1 is not valid").arg(
00194                 table_.value(i)->getName()));
00195             return false;
00196         }
00197     }
00198     return true;
00199 }
00200 
00201 void EndpointModel::apply() {
00202 
00203     if (!isValid())
00204         return;
00205 
00206     // remove old model parameters from original model
00207     modelParameters_->clear();
00208 
00209     for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00210         modelParameters_->insert(table_.value(i)->getName(), table_.value(i));
00211     }
00212 }
00213 
00214 void EndpointModel::restore() {
00215 
00216     beginResetModel();
00217 
00218     // remove old model parameters
00219     table_.clear();
00220 
00221     // add all model parameters to the table
00222     foreach (QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modelParameter, *modelParameters_) {
00223 
00224         // create a copy of the model parameter
00225         table_.append(QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(
00226             new ModelParameter(*modelParameter.data())));
00227     }
00228 
00229     endResetModel();
00230 }
